# Excel Data Search Web Application

This is a Python Flask web application for searching through large Excel datasets with a user-friendly web interface.

## Project Structure
- Flask web application for Excel data search
- Pandas for data processing
- HTML templates for search interface
- Support for multiple Excel file formats

## Features
- Upload Excel files
- Search across all columns
- Filter and sort results
- Export search results
- Responsive web interface

## Development Guidelines
- Use Flask for the web framework
- Use pandas for Excel data processing
- Keep the interface simple and intuitive
- Focus on search performance for large datasets
